alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:09PM EDT until July 25 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR ALAMANCE...ORANGE AND SOUTHEASTERN GUILFORD COUNTIES... At 608 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burlington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chapel Hill, Burlington, Graham, Hillsborough, Carrboro, Mebane, Elon, McLeansville, Gibsonville and Pleasant Garden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
